thread.title: Brooklyn gunman shoots 15-year-old in head, 18-year-old in leg
thread.title_full: Brooklyn gunman shoots 15-year-old in head, 18-year-old in leg

author: ROCCO PARASCANDOLA
title: Brooklyn gunman shoots 15-year-old in head, 18-year-old in leg
text:
A 15-year-old boy was shot in the head in a broad daylight confrontation in Brooklyn Monday afternoon, police sources said. (Debbie Egan-Chin/New York Daily News) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Monday, February 20, 2017, 4:39 PM 
A 15-year-old boy was shot in the head in a broad daylight confrontation in Brooklyn Monday afternoon, police sources said. 
A second victim, an 18-year-old man, was shot in the leg. 
Both victims are expected to survive. Police at the scene of the shooting on E 55th St. and Lenox Road on Monday. (Debbie Egan-Chin/New York Daily News) 
Police are looking for the gunman, who fled the scene in a gray four-door sedan driving north on E. 55th St., sources said. 
24-year-old gang member shot outside Hell’s Kitchen party 
The incident happened at about 2:35 p.m. on E. 55th St., near Lenox Road, in East Flatbush. Sources said the gunman got out of the sedan and opened fire, though it wasn’t immediately clear whom he was targeting. (Debbie Egan-Chin/New York Daily News) 
Sources said the gunman got out of the sedan and opened fire, though it wasn’t immediately clear whom he was targeting. 
The teen was taken by EMS to Brookdale Hospital. The older victim was taken to Kings County Hospital. 
Cops recovered four shell casings from the scene of the crime. Tags:
